AT.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
AT.description: In diesem bunten Rätselspiel erkundet der Spieler als Drachenzähmer Verliese und bekämpft Gegner, indem er 3 oder mehr Sphären desselben Typs in einem Raster ausrichtet. RPG-Elemente sorgen für eine strategische Komponente. Zudem können besiegte Monster rekrutiert und ihre Attribute dann mit Erfahrungspunkten aufgepäppelt werden. Das Paket enthält auch eine Super Mario Bros. Edition mit einer schnittigen Version des Spiels samt Mario & Luigi!

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: Trailer

AU.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
AU.description: In this colourful puzzle game, the player is a Dragon Tamer who explores dungeons, battling enemies by matching three or more Orbs of the same type within a grid. RPG-type elements add a strategic layer, while the player can recruit defeated monsters, then improve their attributes using experience points and Chips. This pack also includes a Super Mario Bros. Edition, featuring a streamlined version of the game starring Mario and Luigi!

BG.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
BG.description: In this colourful puzzle game, the player is a Dragon Tamer who explores dungeons, battling enemies by matching three or more Orbs of the same type within a grid. RPG-type elements add a strategic layer, while the player can recruit defeated monsters, then improve their attributes using experience points and Chips. This pack also includes a Super Mario Bros. Edition, featuring a streamlined version of the game starring Mario and Luigi!

BE.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
BE.description: Dans ce casse-tête coloré, le joueur incarne un dompteur de dragons qui explore les donjons et affronte les ennemis en alignant au moins trois orbes du même type sur une grille. Des éléments de type RPG ajoutent une dimension stratégique et le joueur peut recruter les monstres vaincus, puis améliorer leurs attributs grâce aux points d'expérience et aux puces. Contient aussi Super Mario Bros. Edition, une version du jeu avec Mario et Luigi !

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition : bande-annonce

ES.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
ES.description: En este colorido juego de puzles, el jugador es un domadragones que explora mazmorras y lucha contra sus enemigos encadenando 3 o más esferas del mismo tipo. Los elementos RPG añaden un extra de estrategia: el jugador puede reclutar a los monstruos derrotados y luego mejorarlos usando puntos de experiencia y piezas. Este pack también incluye una Super Mario Bros. Edition que aporta una versión sencilla del juego protagonizada por Mario y Luigi.

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: Tráiler

IT.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
IT.description: In questo coloratissimo puzzle game, il giocatore è un domatore di draghi che esplora i dungeon e combatte i nemici abbinando tre o più sfere dello stesso tipo su una griglia. Gli elementi RPG aggiungono un livello strategico, mentre il giocatore può reclutare i mostri sconfitti e migliorarli usando i punti esperienza e i Chip. Il pack include anche la Super Mario Bros. Edition, una versione ottimizzata del gioco con Mario e Luigi!

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: trailer

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: Trailer

NL.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
NL.description: In deze kleurrijke puzzelgame speel je een drakentemmer die kerkers verkent, en vijanden verslaat door rijen te maken van drie of meer Orbs van dezelfde soort. De RPG-gameplay voegt een strategisch element toe: de speler kan verslagen monsters rekruteren en sterker maken met ervaringspunten en Chips. Dit pakket bevat ook een Super Mario Bros. Edition met een aangepaste versie van de game, waarin Mario en Luigi de hoofdrol spelen!

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: Trailer

NZ.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
NZ.description: In this colourful puzzle game, the player is a Dragon Tamer who explores dungeons, battling enemies by matching three or more Orbs of the same type within a grid. RPG-type elements add a strategic layer, while the player can recruit defeated monsters, then improve their attributes using experience points and Chips. This pack also includes a Super Mario Bros. movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: Trailer

PT.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
PT.description: Neste jogo de quebra-cabeças o jogador é um domador de dragões que explora masmorras e combate inimigos encadeando três ou mais esferas do mesmo tipo numa grelha. Elementos de RPG acrescentam uma camada estratégica, enquanto o jogador pode recrutar monstros derrotados e melhorar os seus atributos usando XP e Chips. Este conjunto inclui também uma Super Mario Bros. Edition com uma versão simplificada do jogo protagonizado por Mario e Luigi.

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z: Trailer de apresentação
Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: Trailer

RU.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В этой яркой головоломке игрок станет укротителем драконов, который исследует подземелья и сражается с врагами, собирая в ряд три сферы стихии одного типа. Ролевые элементы позволят игроку продумывать стратегию, ведь ему придется набирать в команду побежденных монстров и улучшать их характеристики, используя очки опыта и жетоны. Этот набор также включает издание Super Mario Bros. Edition, в этой версии игры главные роли на себя возьмут Марио и Луиджи!

movies.name: Puzzle & Dragons Z: руководство к игре
Puzzle & Dragons Z SMB Edition: трейлер
